com.facebook.buck.parser.spec

Interface TargetNodeSpec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildTargetSpec, TargetNodePredicateSpec

    public interface TargetNodeSpec
    A specification used by the parser to match TargetNode objects.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getTargetType

        TargetNodeSpec.TargetType getTargetType()
        Returns:
        whether spec is a single target requested by a name or a list of targets requested with recursive spec (i.e. ... )

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<BuildTarget,TargetNodeMaybeIncompatible> filter(Iterable<TargetNodeMaybeIncompatible> nodes)

      • getBuildFileSpec

        BuildFileSpec getBuildFileSpec()
        Returns:
        a BuildFileSpec representing the build files to parse to search for specific build target.

      • getBuildTargetPattern

        BuildTargetPattern getBuildTargetPattern(Cell cell)
        Convert from a legacy TargetNodeSpec to a new-hotness BuildTargetPattern.

        This conversion is imperfect and best-effort. If possible, use BuildTargetPatternParser.parse(String, CellNameResolver) to create a BuildTargetPattern instead.

        This conversion is lossy. Some attributes, such as whether test targets should be included, are not reflected in the result.

        Parameters:
        cell - this TargetNodeSpec's cell. Some implementations of TargetNodeSpec do not store a cell name, so cell provides the name.
        Returns:
        a pattern matching the same targets as this pattern.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - cell refers to a cell different from this TargetNodeSpec's cell. This exception is best-effort.
